00035 /*
00036  * Helper class for writing hgr scene files. 
00037  * See maxexport and Scene::Scene for usage examples
00038  * and hgr-fileformat.txt for documentation.
00039  * @ingroup hgr
00040  */
00041 class SceneOutputStream :
00042     public io::DataOutputStream
00043 {
00044 public:
00046     static const int VERSION;
00047

00055 
00057     ~SceneOutputStream();
00058

00065

00116                 const lang::Array<Node*>& globnodelist );
